definitions.definition: A ceremony amongst certain indigenous peoples of the Pacific Northwest in which gifts are bestowed upon guests and personal property is destroyed in a show of generosity and wealth .
A communal meal to which guests bring dishes to share ; a potluck .

main_definition: ( Canada , US , also figuratively ) A ceremony amongst certain indigenous peoples of the Pacific Northwest in which gifts are bestowed upon guests and personal property is destroyed in a show of generosity and wealth .
secondary_definitions: ( US , chiefly Alaska ) A communal meal to which guests bring dishes to share ; a potluck .
